Losungen.Losungstext: but the seventh day is a Sabbath to the Lord your God. On it you shall not do any work, you or your son or your daughter or your male servant or your female servant, or your ox or your donkey or any of your livestock, or the sojourner who is within your gates, that your male servant and your female servant may rest as well as you.
But the word is very near you. It is in your mouth and in your heart, so that you can do it.
When Jesus had received the sour wine, he said, “It is finished,” and he bowed his head and gave up his spirit.
Jesus said to them again, “Peace be with you. As the Father has sent me, even so I am sending you.”
Now faith is the assurance of things hoped for, the conviction of things not seen.
Do not neglect to show hospitality to strangers, for thereby some have entertained angels unawares.
Sow for yourselves righteousness; reap steadfast love; break up your fallow ground, for it is the time to seek the Lord, that he may come and rain righteousness upon you.
So we have come to know and to believe the love that God has for us. God is love, and whoever abides in love abides in God, and God abides in him.
He has made everything beautiful in its time. Also, he has put eternity into man’s heart, yet so that he cannot find out what God has done from the beginning to the end.
My heart throbs; my strength fails me, and the light of my eyes—it also has gone from me.
And I saw the holy city, new Jerusalem, coming down out of heaven from God, prepared as a bride adorned for her husband.
When they saw the star, they rejoiced exceedingly with great joy.
